item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:47, topic:526264”][quote author=PI_Developer link=topic=645005.msg4340022#msg4340022 date=1375042660][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=645005.msg4339961#msg4339961 date=1375032623]

[quote author=PI_Developer link=topic=645005.msg4339524#msg4339524 date=1374947774][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=645005.msg4339441#msg4339441 date=1374925325]
Which God did the man on the internet have an experience with? Yahweh? El? Almaqah? Moloch? Freyr? Loki? Odin? Lofn? Belobog? Zeme? Inti? Wiraqucha? Make-make? Tonatiuh? Mictecacihuatl? Vāc? Tenjin (the Japanese God of scholarship would love to teach the equations for energy)? A’as (the Hittite God of wisdom would also love to teach about energy)?
[/quote]God of Christianity[/quote]
Yes, I mentioned the name of the “God of Christianity” in my list above (at least, the name of the Christian God given in the Old Testament). So which one is it? I’d like to see how much you know about the topic.
[/quote]
Who ever said I knew a lot about Christianity?
I sure as hell didn’t.
I didn’t grow up Christian.
I’ve been to church maybe 5 times in my life.
I really don’t know shit about my religion, I only started BELIEVING in God under a year ago.
If you wanna get on my ass about it, fudge you, you can leave me alone too.
[/quote]

This is the Intellectual Discussions and Debates section. The adjective “intellectual” can be defined as: “A person possessing a highly developed intellect.” This generally means that you possess some knowledge about the topics that you are trying to discuss. Seeing as you specifically mentioned Christianity in the title, it is expected that you have enough knowledge about Christianity to discuss it. I’d also suggest you read the Section Rules because at the moment you’re breaking some of them (as well as general forum rules).[/quote]

Theism:Christianity; Back to Originality
My goal in this topic was to have people view the question the way it is rather than the way it has become.
So, you can suck my dick. Hop off

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:44, topic:526264”][quote author=PI_Developer link=topic=645005.msg4339943#msg4339943 date=1375030205]

I never agreed with the bible…

Until now! We must all follow these teachings.

“I do not permit a woman to teach or to assume authority over a man; she must be quiet”. -1 Timothy 2:12

“For the man is not of the woman; but the woman of the man. Neither was the man created for the woman; but the woman for the man.” (I Corinthians 11:8-9)

Fact is there is a lot of stupid stuff in the bible written for older times. Times where they didn’t know jack shit about the natural world. If you truly believe it is the word of god, than you can’t just pick the parts you like and ignore the others. Even out of context those verses are quite clear. It’s time to silence women once and for all.

I second this, let men take charge once more! Imprison the women who disagree and force all others to be home makers who only bare children!

Okay, go to mopar jail, Amy. Come on.
[/quote]
Originality and hilarious remarks at its prime.you are truly at the pinnacle of it.[/quote]
Like I said, leave me the fuck alone. Is that too much for you to handle?
Go ahead and reply to this thread again, I’m just ignoring you from now on.

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:37, topic:526264”][quote author=PI_Developer link=topic=645005.msg4339524#msg4339524 date=1374947774]

CONCLUSION: You are an illiterate, hypocritical, argumentative person who DOES NOT EVEN KNOW WHAT THEY ARE TALKING ABOUT.
You need to now, get the fudge off of my topic, do not post again, you’re not doing ANYONE ANY good by posting. If you do happen to post again
because of your need to prove me wrong in everything I do (which by the way backfires on you), I shall show you up again, and again, and again, until you finally stop. BYE.

First of all, considering that you don’t use words correctly nor make sense, i don’t think you should be calling Chillwitm888 illiterate.
Sorry, i didn’t see the part where he was being hypocritical? Where did he say something that he didn’t practice?
To say he, alone, is an argumentative person because of his statements is wrong. He was stating his opinion on the matter, and you being unable to accept anything disproving said against your religion, argued.
When it comes to religion, nobody knows what they’re talking about because everything is different. There are too many renditions of religion to fully understand its meaning, and considering our social values have changed i don’t think we will ever know why.
This forum was made for anyone to browse and contribute to, and considering this thread is on the forum, anyone can and will comment on your thread if they see fit. I don’t think you should be one to dictate who comments on not as you asked for peoples opinions, do not bash those who come forward. That is extremely hypocritical of you.
Vanity isn’t something people cherish, stating that you are showing him up and will do so again and again when it is your own opinion is disgraceful. How do you expect a fair argument when you state that you are right and he is wrong because you believe your own opinion is the only correct one? That is extremely bias, there is no justice in your statements.

Your use of insulting words shows that your arguments are less valid then you think they seem, it expressed that you are informal to those who read it. I doubt those who read your argument think they are as well presented as you do. Maybe you should refrain from insulting others with pointless words and actually get on to proving your point.

You cannot believe both evolution and god’s creations as they contradict each other causing unstable beliefs. It is impossible to say god created evolution when we understand that our ancestors are of primate decedent, and yet god created humans as they are.

Yeah, I’m a bitch dude.
[/quote]
Lol’d, is that all you’ve got? Nice.[/quote]
No, you’re also a bitch.
Gtfo

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:34, topic:526264”][quote author=PI_Developer link=topic=645005.msg4339595#msg4339595 date=1374960091]

Actually read your commandments
Agree with your adversary quickly, submitting even to wrong for the sake of peace (Matt. 5:25; 1 Cor. 6:7).
Bless them that curse you; let no cursing come out of your mouth (Matt. 5:44; Rom. 12:14).
Grudge not: judge not: complain not: condemn not (James 5:9; Matt. 7:1).
Put away anger, wrath, bitterness, and all evil speaking (Eph. 4:31; 1 Pet. 2:1).

There’s hardly any true Christians out there. You are not included.
In your life I bet you’ve broken even more, this is just from a post
Actually read and understand your religion before you keep spewing crap

You just quoted
‘Put away anger, wrath, bitterness, and all evil speaking’
Yet you try to make me mad (which worked) on the same post.
How can you assume ANYTHING about my life?

Go.
Straight.
To.
Hell.
I wasn’t talking to you (anymore)
I wasn’t talking about you (anymore)
Leave me the fudge alone, stop assuming bullshit, stop trying to make me mad.
Neither one of us can stop being hypocritical, so just go.
[/quote]
You can go to “hell”
You aren’t even fit to be a true Christian how sad. If you are a true believer, the least you can do is follow rules. Too bad I don’t believe in hell either. You do.
I’m not trying to make you mad, but since all you spewed at me was violent crap. I will do the same. I am free of religion and I am allowed to speak without breaking any rules.
Dick[/quote]
Leave me alone, will you?

[quote=“Davidi2, post:35, topic:526264”]The problem with Christianity (and the reason people don’t like Christians) is that they have perverted what the religion is about. It’s not all about judgement and interfering with other peoples lives, it’s the opposite. Believing in a God should not be a reason for other people to hate you, it’s what Christians do with it that annoys everyone.

The main problem with people arguing FOR Christianity is the need to try and prove others wrong. You see someone point out a contradiction in the bible and the immediate reaction is to try and say “well, those actually mean two different things!”. Fact of the matter is those contradictions exist, and the reason is because of how the bible is written (many different people writing different sections).

tl;dr - Both Christians and people arguing against them look at the bible in the wrong way. It is a life story with one overall theme, you can live a greater, more fulfilling life (even if you don’t want to believe in heaven/hell) by loving other people, and nitpicking verses (for either side) is laughable.[/quote]
Very non-mainstream of you. Agreed

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The problem with Christianity (and the reason people don’t like Christians) is that they have perverted what the religion is about. It’s not all about judgement and interfering with other peoples lives, it’s the opposite. Believing in a God should not be a reason for other people to hate you, it’s what Christians do with it that annoys everyone.

The main problem with people arguing FOR Christianity is the need to try and prove others wrong. You see someone point out a contradiction in the bible and the immediate reaction is to try and say “well, those actually mean two different things!”. Fact of the matter is those contradictions exist, and the reason is because of how the bible is written (many different people writing different sections).

tl;dr - Both Christians and people arguing against them look at the bible in the wrong way. It is a life story with one overall theme, you can live a greater, more fulfilling life (even if you don’t want to believe in heaven/hell) by loving other people, and nitpicking verses (for either side) is laughable.

Read full topic

@PI_Developer wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:27, topic:526264”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=645005.msg4339482#msg4339482 date=1374937696]
I think without Christianity and other religions we would have 10x more crime, so its good that we have it, I just choose to not follow it.
[/quote]

that is a horrible thing to assume.

just because people dont have a religion doesnt mean they dont have morals. I’ve never been to church(or any religious temple) in my life, and I’m not a religious person and I haven’t committed any crimes.[/quote]
That is you my man. A lot of people with faith do feel horrible when they do something wrong.

Ambokile:

Which God did the man on the internet have an experience with? Yahweh? El? Almaqah? Moloch? Freyr? Loki? Odin? Lofn? Belobog? Zeme? Inti? Wiraqucha? Make-make? Tonatiuh? Mictecacihuatl? Vāc? Tenjin (the Japanese God of scholarship would love to teach the equations for energy)? A’as (the Hittite God of wisdom would also love to teach about energy)?

God of Christianity

[quote=“amy_webb, post:25, topic:526264”][quote author=PI_Developer link=topic=645005.msg4339206#msg4339206 date=1374878401]
CONCLUSION: You are an illiterate, hypocritical, argumentative person who DOES NOT EVEN KNOW WHAT THEY ARE TALKING ABOUT.
You need to now, get the fudge off of my topic, do not post again, you’re not doing ANYONE ANY good by posting. If you do happen to post again
because of your need to prove me wrong in everything I do (which by the way backfires on you), I shall show you up again, and again, and again, until you finally stop. BYE.
[/quote]
First of all, considering that you don’t use words correctly nor make sense, i don’t think you should be calling Chillwitm888 illiterate.
Sorry, i didn’t see the part where he was being hypocritical? Where did he say something that he didn’t practice?
To say he, alone, is an argumentative person because of his statements is wrong. He was stating his opinion on the matter, and you being unable to accept anything disproving said against your religion, argued.
When it comes to religion, nobody knows what they’re talking about because everything is different. There are too many renditions of religion to fully understand its meaning, and considering our social values have changed i don’t think we will ever know why.
This forum was made for anyone to browse and contribute to, and considering this thread is on the forum, anyone can and will comment on your thread if they see fit. I don’t think you should be one to dictate who comments on not as you asked for peoples opinions, do not bash those who come forward. That is extremely hypocritical of you.
Vanity isn’t something people cherish, stating that you are showing him up and will do so again and again when it is your own opinion is disgraceful. How do you expect a fair argument when you state that you are right and he is wrong because you believe your own opinion is the only correct one? That is extremely bias, there is no justice in your statements.

Your use of insulting words shows that your arguments are less valid then you think they seem, it expressed that you are informal to those who read it. I doubt those who read your argument think they are as well presented as you do. Maybe you should refrain from insulting others with pointless words and actually get on to proving your point.

You cannot believe both evolution and god’s creations as they contradict each other causing unstable beliefs. It is impossible to say god created evolution when we understand that our ancestors are of primate decedent, and yet god created humans as they are.[/quote]
Yeah, I’m a bitch dude.

Bowser jr:

God of the bible says that all other gods are fakes. So you cannot say that all gods are the same. Norse faith tells us that we come from trees, God say we come from dust. Both can’t be true.

If you look at the elements we are made of, we actually are made of dirt and ash. However, I do feel like the Bible has some things in it that should not be.
